title: Extremely accurate measurements of atom states for quantum computing

title_detail.value: Extremely accurate measurements of atom states for quantum computing

summary: A new method allows the quantum state of atomic 'qubits'--the basic unit of information in quantum computers -- to be measured with twenty times less error than was previously possible, without losing any atoms.

summary_detail.value: A new method allows the quantum state of atomic 'qubits'--the basic unit of information in quantum computers -- to be measured with twenty times less error than was previously possible, without losing any atoms.
